title: Hard to windward
creator_credit: Max Graham, Norman Laird and Tasmanian Government Film Unit
brief_description: The Sydney-Hobart Yacht Race, Starting every year on Boxing Day. Shows the start in Sydney Harbour, following one boat through the race to the finish on the River Derwent, and celebrations and prize giving which follow.
